Class Agent

  • java.lang.Object
    • Agent

  • public abstract class Agent
extends java.lang.Object
    Holds implementation of Agent's acting procedures. All new agents should inherit from this class since act() is not implemented, i.e. there is no default act() action for an agent.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private long id
      ID of the agent.
      private int inventory
      Number of shares bought or sold.
      private boolean lastOrderTraded 
      private MatchingEngine matchEng
      Matching engine that is used in the simulation.
      private long nextActTime
      Next time that the agent can act.
      private boolean willAct
      Is true if the agent is chosen to act by the Controller.

      Agent(MatchingEngine matchEng)

    • Field Detail

      • id

        private final long id
        ID of the agent. Used by the Order class to track agents.

      • matchEng

        private final MatchingEngine matchEng
        Matching engine that is used in the simulation. Should not be changed.

      • nextActTime

        private final long nextActTime
        Next time that the agent can act. This is determined in the act() method.

      • willAct

        private boolean willAct
        Is true if the agent is chosen to act by the Controller. Will remain true if the agent still wants to act during a turn.

      • inventory

        private int inventory
        Number of shares bought or sold. If the agent has sold more than it has bought, then this number will be negative.

      • lastOrderTraded

        private boolean lastOrderTraded

    • Constructor Detail

      • Agent

        public Agent(MatchingEngine matchEng)
        Parameters:
        matchEng - Creates an agent object with the ID as a time stamp in milliseconds. Must pass in the MatchingEngine that is used for the simulation.

    • Method Detail

      • act

        abstract void act()
        Method to be implemented by subclasses of Agent. Holds different trading strategy code depending on the type of agent desired.

      • getNextActTime

        public long getNextActTime()
        Returns:
        The next time the agent needs to act. This is determined by the act() method.

      • getWillAct

        public boolean getWillAct()
        Returns:
        True if the agent still needs to act during its turn. False if it is done for its turn.

      • setWillAct

        public void setWillAct(boolean act)
        Parameters:
        act - Enable the agent to act during its time slot. This is set by the controller when it chooses agents to act for certain time slots.

      • cancelOrder

        public void cancelOrder(Order o)
        Parameters:
        Order - Calls the MatchingEngine to cancel the agent's order.

      • createNewOrder

        public void createNewOrder(double price,
                  int initialQuant,
                  boolean buyOrder)

      • modifyOrder

        public void modifyOrder(Order o,
               double newPrice,
               int newQuant)

      • setLastOrderTraded

        public void setLastOrderTraded(boolean traded,
                      int volume)
